info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 9:01AM EST until further notice by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Housatonic River at Falls Village. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 9.0 feet, Water floods Riverside Road at Kent School and begins to approach buildings. Water gets close to Route 7. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:15 AM EST Monday the stage was 4.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tonight and continue rising to 8.6 feet Wednesday morning. Additional rises are possible thereafter. - Flood stage is 7.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Housatonic River Falls Village Flood Stage: 7.0 Observed Stage at Mon 8 am: 4.8 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 4.8 Mon 7 pm 5.7 Tue 1 am 6.6 Tue 7 am 7.4 Tue 1 pm 7.9 Tue 7 pm 8.2 Wed 1 am 8.5 Wed 7 am 8.6 Wed 1 pm MSG Wed 7 pm MSG Thu 1 am MSG &&
